mapper.insert: insert into gc_siji ( `bizdate`, `forwunit`, `carnum`, `steelnum`, `specs`, `packnum`, `tonnage`, `baseprice`, `coefficient`, `tranrate`, `trancost`, `arrivstation`, `payer`, `inforfee`, `remark`, `issueoffice`, `aminvoice`, `custompay`, `taxdatepay`, order_no, pid,dept_id,updated_name ) values ( #{bizdate}, #{forwunit}, #{carnum}, #{steelnum}, #{specs}, #{packnum}, #{tonnage}, #{baseprice}, #{coefficient}, #{tranrate}, #{trancost}, #{arrivstation}, #{payer}, #{inforfee}, #{remark}, #{issueoffice}, #{aminvoice}, #{custompay}, #{taxdatepay}, #{orderNo}, #{pid}, #{deptId}, #{updatedName} )
mapper.delete:
delete from gc_siji where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select f.`id`,f.`bizdate`,f.`forwunit`,f.`carnum`, f.`arrivstation`,f.`remark`,f.`inforfee`, f.`payer`,f.order_no,f.pid,f.custompay as scustompay,
i.`steelnum`,i.`specs`,i.`packnum`,i.`zhinum`, i.`tonnage`,i.`baseprice`,i.`coefficient`,i.`tranrate`,i.`trancost`,
i.billdate,i.`aminvoice`,i.`issueoffice`,i.`issueofficedate`, i.`custompay`,i.`taxdatepay`,i.`paydate` from gc_siji f inner join gc_siji_item i on f.pid = i.pid
and f.bizdate >= #{startDate} and f.bizdate <= #{endDate}
and f.inforfee like CONCAT('%',#{inforfee},'%')
and f.carnum like CONCAT('%',#{carnum},'%')
and f.arrivstation like CONCAT('%',#{arrivstation},'%')
and f.dept_id = #{deptId}
order by f.order_no desc,i.id asc

select s.inforfee ,
IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -11 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth11', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -10 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth10', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -9 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth9', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -8 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth8', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -7 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth7', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -6 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth6',
IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -5 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth5', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -4 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth4', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -3 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth3', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -2 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth2', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval -1 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth1', IFNULL(sum(case when LEFT(bizdate,7) = date_format(date_add(now(), interval 0 month), '%Y-%m') then IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost) end),0) as 'bizMonth0' ,IFNULL(sum(si.aminvoice),0) as aminvoice ,IFNULL(sum(if(si.aminvoice is not null, 0,si.trancost)),0) as trancost ,IFNULL(sum(IFNULL(si.aminvoice,si.trancost)),0) as totalAmount from gc_siji s inner join gc_siji_item si on s.pid = si.pid where 1=1
and s.dept_id = #{deptId}
and s.inforfee like CONCAT('%',#{inforfee},'%')
group by s.inforfee
order by inforfee desc
